ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of WILLIAM PENTNEY of Nepean, Ontario, as a director of Defence Construction (1951) Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Nancy Penner.
